This prisoner wasn't treated nicely. Coalition is brutal to Separatists. "Thank you for rescuing me! I'll spread the word with our captains about what you've done."
This prisoner wasn't treated nicely. Coalition is brutal to Separatists. "Thank you for rescuing me! I'll spread the word with our captains about what you've done." [SEPARATISTS REP+10]
Poor clown thought that Coalition guards have sense of humour. "Thanks to you, I can spread joy elsewhere. My music is not yet silenced! Blessings of the Honk Mother upon thee."
Poor clown thought that Coalition guards have sense of humour. "Thanks to you, I can spread joy elsewhere. My music is not yet silenced! Blessings of the Honk Mother upon thee." [CLOWN REP+10]

Coalition is so paranoid about separatist spies, they often imprison ordinary outpost dwellers and submariners and gives them the same treatment as they would give to an enemy... "Thanks for getting me out of there! I was mopping a floor in the dock when I was arrested and accused of listening in on the conversations in the command room! I see it clearly now. Coalition are the real terrorists!"

"Only researchers can enter this laboratory."

Option.text: [OUTPOST REP 100] "I'm working for the research team. Here's my ID."

ConversationAction.text: "You've proven yourself to be an experienced sailor, so I trust you with these missions."
"There are some sensitive cargo crates that nobody wants to deliver, so naturally, we are asking you to do it."
"There are some sensitive cargo crates that nobody wants to deliver, so naturally, we are asking you to do it."
There is plenty of work to be done. These are the most needed tasks.
There is always more to be done. You can take on this contract.
This task requires a well organised crew!
We need to see what types of minerals exist in this location before we start large scale mining operation. See what you can find.
We need you to clear out nests so we can keep digging in the caves.
Various other tasks are needed too.
We need you to exterminate a small swarm
We need you to exterminate a large swarm. I hope you are ready for it...
We need you to get rid of massive threats to human settlements in the area. You'd better pack some serious firepower.
We need you to bring us a particular artifact that shows strange behaviour.
We need you to bring us a particular artifact that shows strange behaviour.
There are non-research related tasks too.
"Wha... who are you! What are you doing here!?"

Option.text: "We came here to kill you, obviously."
[DELIVERY] "I've been looking for you. Got something I'm supposed to deliver - your hands only"
[OUTPOST REP 90]"We work for the station. We are not looking for trouble."
[SEPARATIST REP 50] "Sic semper tyrannis. We're here to help."

ConversationAction.text: A WANTED poster from a noticeboard...
Bounty target eliminated [750mk] [COALITION REP +6]
"Are you the ressuply crew? What's the password!?"

Option.text: [LOCATION REP 50]"We work for the station and this beacon needs fixing.

ConversationAction.text: You cleared out a separatist hideout... [Reward 800mk] [COALITION REP +8] [SEPARATIST REP -15]
[COALITION REP 40] "This is Coalition Officer speaking. I'm ordering you to clear out a separatist hideout in a nearby beacon!"
Radio transmission: "Hello, travelers! We could use your help here in the beacon station."
A young captain dressed up in a separatist's uniform welcomes you with his hands behind his back, seemingly proud of their operations here. "Welcome to our station, Comrades."

Option.text: [SEPARATIST REP 30] "What are you doing out here?"

ConversationAction.text: "We've repurposed this beacon into a broadcasting station to spread the truth to nearby outposts to fight the propaganda. People need to realize that the Coalition is manipulating them into submission."

Option.text: [HELM 70]"Listen here, "comrade". Coalition vessels are making rounds through these tunnels, nuking hideouts like this without warning. Some day, they will pay you a visit and the blood of this crew is on your hands. Cut off the broadcast, close this operation and save your people before it's too late."

ConversationAction.text: "Silence us? Is that what you want? Do you seriously think you can scare us?"

Option.text: [SEPARATIST REP 50] "I'm on your side and I don't want to risk lives of these people just for some stupid broadcast that nobody listens to anyways."

ConversationAction.text: The beacon's commander smiles, as if preparing for a perfect comeback, to which his expression shifts to a more serious, defeated look. "Fuck, you're right. I shouldn't have risked our lives for this." He orders his people to start packing. [SEPARATISTS +10][COALITION +5]
The beacon crew has been convinced to abandon their posts and cease all operations. Preperations to abandon station have been put into place. [SEPARATIST REP +10][COALITION REP+5]
"That's defeatist speech. Go polish coalition officer's shoes, you coward."

Option.text: "Have it your way! Even if you survive, don't think that we'll offer you refuge on our submarine when the Coalition starts hunting you down!" [SEPARATIST REP -3]

ConversationAction.text: "You have no clue what you're talking about."

Option.text: "Good. Challenge people's views, make them think. That's exactly what will bring down the Coalition in the long run.

Count the personnel, inspect their equipment, and look at the crew registry - have Coalition deal with them later. Thanks to this information, these people will get arrested at the first station they visit and not even their relatives will escape the punishment. You won't have to witness any of it. [COALITION REP +8][SEPARATIST REP -10]

ConversationAction.text: "Sorry, I can't disclose any details; orders."
"We need some supplies to stay here a bit longer. Our mechanic will have more details."

Option.text: "You've made a serious mistake letting us in, *comrade*..."

ConversationAction.text: "Never should have come here!"[COALITION REP +6]
You see a Mechanic looking through a hole in the wall, a screwdriver in hand. "Oh, hello! Did you come by to help? We need somebody to repair this busted old piece of junk. The FPGA circuit broke."

Option.text: [ENGI 50][FPGA CIRCUIT] "Sure, I got one; let me help."

ConversationAction.text: You lean into the hole in the wall, finding a circuit board of rusted up electronics. You see an old, half burnt FPGA Circuit inside the innerlinings of the metal wall. You snap it out of its slot and replace it with a shiny new one.

"Thanks! This place'll be running for a little while longer now. I don't have much, but you can take this here incendium shard. Snatched it from one of the Medical Officers while they were busy, heh! Probably worth something, so, don't spend it all in one place if you catch my drift."

Option.text: "Great! Good luck with your operations." [SEPARATIST REP +3]
"I don't need anything, thanks. It was just a cheap circuit. Good luck with your operations!" [SEPARATIST REP +7]
[WEAPONS 20] "I've spent time, expertise, and material to help you. Surely you can reward me properly."

ConversationAction.text: "Hey, hey! You're pushing your luck 'ere, stranger.. This Crystal has its values, but.. Eh, whatever, here - take it. Probably not worth anything anyways..quot; [SEPARATIST REP +3]
[WEAPON 20 FAILED] "Sorry, but that's all I've got. Take it or leave it." [SEPARATIST REP -2]
[ENGI 60 FAILED] "You seem to be as clueless as I am!"
"Even I know that that's not an FPGA circuit, kid."
"'You a clown? The real kind?"
"Hm... Ya don't seem like it... Nevermind." [CLOWNS -5]
Mechanic chuckles, but quickly returns to his work. [CLOWN REP +5]
Looks like you've forgotten your bike horn at home. Sad. [CLOWN REP -5]

It's immediately obvious that these people haven't heard music or smiled in a long time. Your song touches the souls of those in the beacon, and leaves everyone in a good mood. [CLOWN REP +10][SEPARATISTS REP +3]
Playing on an imaginary air guitar doesn't entertain the mechanic whatsoever. [CLOWN REP -5]
Mechanic with prosthetic hands approaches you at the bar. "Hey, you have a submarine, right? One with guns and shit? I need a ride. I'll pay you good." [MISSION: PASSENGER TRANSPORT, REWARD: 800mk]

Option.text: [DECLINE] "Nope. Our air is thin enough already."

ConversationAction.text: "Thanks for the ride. I'll see you around." [MISSION COMPLETE 800mk OUTPOST REP+5]
"How long is it going to take?"
"Thanks for getting me out of that shithole."
[PASSENGER MISSION COMPLETE 800mk OUTPOST REP+5]
"We'll see who will have the last laugh! The Honkmother watches over me."
"You need me! If you kill us, they will not pay you! You'll all become ones with the ocean eventually. There is no point in delaying the inevitable..."
"Wanna bet 100mk on one of the muddies in the next mudraptor race?"
Not enough cash...
Red has won the race!
Green has won the race!
Blue has won the race!
